description:
The security_groups parameter on server create is not validated against existing security_groups, which could lead to data corruption with bogus data being created.

This test should be added to: _validate_and_provision_server in https://github.com/openstack/nova/blob/master/nova/compute/api.py#L463

There is a tempest test for this which was previously skipped.
title: nova does not validate security groups

comments.content:
The security_groups parameter on server create is not validated against existing security_groups, which could lead to data corruption with bogus data being created.

This test should be added to: _validate_and_provision_server in https://github.com/openstack/nova/blob/master/nova/compute/api.py#L463

There is a tempest test for this which was previously skipped.
